triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The survey examines approaches for controlling autonomous unmanned aerial vehicles in networked settings.

triples.name: Wireless network
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the challenge of coordinating multiple UAVs through wireless communication networks.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is the primary technique being surveyed for solving autonomous multi-UAV wireless network problems.
